title: An exortacion to charite very needefull at this tyme for eche man and woman to inbrace, compyled by Wyllyam Conway.
author: Conway, William, fl. 1550.
publicationStmtPublisher: In fletestrete at the sygne of the George, nexte to saynt Dunstones church by Wyllyam Powel. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum,
